summary: A german translation of a great Mod to get more lives in Skyrim!!!
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=#ffff00][size=3]
This is the Travellers of Skyrim - Travelers translation in german language.


[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

- First download [i][color=#ffff00][size=3]the original Mod[/size][/color][/i][i][color=#ffff00][size=3] from here: [/size][/color][/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15501/? ][i][color=#ffff00][size=3][i][size=3][color=#1e84cc][i][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15501/?[/size][/i][/color] [/size][/i][/size][/color][/i][/url]

- Then unrarÂ [i][color=#ffff00][size=3]the needed files[/size][/color][/i] and copy them in Skyrim/DATA

- At last download, unrar the translation for the version you needed in the main game folder and copy the 2 files of each version over if asked

- That's all!!!


Many thanks to [b]m0nster[/b] who made the original Mod in english and allowed me to release the german translation of the newest version.

[b]IMPORTANT: If you want to endorse, please do it to m0nster for his main hard work, too.[/b][/size][/color][/i]
author: Astra2000
